DOC.brief_summary: The purpose proposal evaluate compare health benefit use upper extremity exercise versus functional electrical stimulation lower extremity exercise . It hypothesis Functional Electrical Stimulation Leg Cycle Ergometry ( FES LCE ) exercise voluntary Arm Crank Ergometry ( ACE ) upper extremity exercise increase whole body energy expenditure , thereby increase muscle mass , insulin sensitivity , glucose effectiveness improve lipid profile adult paraplegia .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Reduce Obesity Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : Spinal cord injury ( SCI ) predispose individual impaired fitness , obesity , glucose intolerance insulin resistance , place great risk diabetes , coronary artery disease , upper extremity overuse syndrome body weight increase . The specific objective current proposal compare impact FES ( functional electrical stimulation ) low extremity exercise versus upper extremity arm crank ergometry energy metabolism , body composition fat deposition , insulin sensitivity , glucose effectiveness , low extremity bone mineral density lipid profile , adult complete paraplegia . Research Plan : A randomized , baseline-controlled , prospective , 16-week interventional trial employ assess impact FES LCE versus volitional arm crank ergometry exercise energy metabolism , body composition fat deposition , insulin sensitivity , glucose effectiveness , low extremity bone mineral density lipid profile adult complete paraplegia . Methods : Twenty-four 18-65 y.o . individual motor complete T4-L2 SCI assign either FES low extremity exercise upper extremity arm crank ergometry compare impact energy expenditure , obesity , insulin sensitivity . Both group provide similar nutritional assessment intervention . Exercise train consist five , 40-minute session 70 % maximal heart rate ( HRmax ) week total 16 week . Resting metabolic rate , exercise energy expenditure , body composition 4-compartment modeling , visceral adiposity , insulin sensitivity , glucose effectiveness , lipid profile , low extremity bone mineral density ( BMD ) determine 16-week exercise intervention .
DOC.criteria: Criteria participation include men woman within age range 1865 year old BMI > 25 kg/m2 T4L2 MotorComplete ( ASIA A & B ) SCI duration great 12 month ensure homogenous sample . Persons unresponsive surface neurostimulation , participate FES ACE exercise ( > 60 minutes/week ) program within past 3 month , know orthopedic limitation , CAD , diabetes mellitus ( fast glucose > 126 HgbA1c > 7.0 ) know family history , hypothyroidism , and/or renal disease exclude study . Additionally , individual uncontrolled autonomic dysreflexia , recent ( within 3 month ) deep vein thrombosis , pressure ulcer > Grade II exclude .
